text: Theodore Martin McGinley (born May 30, 1958) is an American actor. He is known for his roles as Jefferson D'Arcy on the television sitcom Married... with Children and as Charley Shanowski on the ABC sitcom Hope & Faith. He also plays Derek on the Apple TV+ comedy drama series Shrinking. McGinley was born in Newport Beach, California. He married actress Gigi Rice in 1991. They have two sons, Beau and Quinn. == Other websites == * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Orange County, California Category:People from Newport Beach, California
title: Ted McGinley
